name: 1NV4D3
description:
Invade Earth while causing as much destruction! Use the sling action to build up enough speed to destroy objects. Pad thai are your life points!

Inspired by NFT project OctoHedz.

Stream INVASION EP!

Follow XA4K on Twitter!

Controls:
  • Arrows keys: move
  • X: sling
  • Enter/Start: PICO-8 menu
